document.full_text: prosecutors and defense lawyers struck a deal on thursday that resolves charges against all six massachusetts teens accused in the case of phoebe prince, who hanged herself at age 15 after she was bullied relentlessly for months at her high school.
document.title: deal struck in deadly massachusetts bullying case
lines_and_colors: prosecutors and defense lawyers struck a deal on thursday that resolves charges against all six massachusetts teens accused in the case of phoebe prince, who hanged herself at age 15 after she was bullied relentlessly for months at her high school.
